title: r/Prorevenge I Destroyed My Noisy Neighbor's Life, Business, and Home
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP has a bunch of neighbors who intentionally go out of their way to make his life miserable. They hold loud parties every single weekend and blast loud music to prevent him from sleeping. Well, when these neighbors decide to remodel their house, they discover one very important fact about OP: he's a construction/permit lawyer. So when the neighbors make one tiny mistake during their remodeling, OP has all the ammo he needs to make their lives utter hell.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
